variable.name: params
variable.expression: groovyScript("def result=''; def params=\"${_1}\".replaceAll('[\\\\[|\\\\]|\\\\s]', '').split(',').toList(); for(i = 0; i < params.size(); i++) {result+=' * @param ' + params[i] + '\\t' + ((i < params.size() - 1) ? '\\n' : '')}; return result", methodParameters())

template.name: aa
template.value: /** * @author Zhang Pengfei * @TODO $TODO$ * @date $DATE$ $TIMEA$ * @version V1.0 * @Copyright Â© 2000-2019 Xi'an Webber Software. All Rights Reserved. */
